editorialNotes.short: Create, edit and view your documents from your iPhone or iPad.
Create, edit and share your files from your iPhone or iPad.

editorialNotes.standard: This digital notepad and PDF markup tool covers all the bases. Create notes with your keyboard or Apple Pencil: the app transforms your hand-drawn shapes into perfect ones, and can even convert your handwriting to text.
editorialNotes.short: Go paperless with ease and enjoy the handwriting recognition feature.
Create, present and share your slides from your iPhone or iPad.

ios.subtitle: AI Note Taking and Study Help

editorialNotes.standard: We rely on this sleek, powerful notetaker to annotate documents, record lectures, sketch illustrations and more. With built-in iCloud support, it’s perfect for keeping notes, documents and doodles up to date across devices.
editorialNotes.short: Annotate documents, record lectures, sketch illustrations and more.
Keep a handwritten journal and collaborate with friends.

name: DeepSeek - AI Assistant
artistName: 杭州深度求索人工智能基础技术研究有限公司

editorialNotes.standard: This app offers the flexibility you’ve always wished for when taking notes on longer documents. Quickly drag excerpts to a separate workspace, make comments, compare distant sections and more. You’ll forget how you ever read without it.
editorialNotes.short: Easily make notes and comments on the documents you read.
Ditch your paper notebook for digital notes that can be easily searched, organised, and shared.

name: Clean Now：Clean Up Storage
artistName: Shanghai Grammar Tree Technology Co., Ltd

editorialNotes.standard: Give your brain a break with this digital notepad for logging your thoughts. Create private pages for lists, diaries and random thoughts, or shared ones to collaborate with friends and colleagues.

Here’s a simple truth: we don’t work with documents on mobile the same way we do on desktop. So it makes sense that Microsoft reimagined Office for a uniquely mobile experience where being productive feels frictionless.
editorialNotes.short: Word, Excel, and PowerPoint.
Manage your mail efficiently and never miss an important event.

editorialNotes.standard: Equal parts task manager and calendar, this app has helped us build a schedule that’s as productive as it is practical. And with apps for Apple Watch and Mac, it can help keep you on track wherever you go.

name: Kilonotes-Notes & PDF reading
artistName: Hefei T-Stack Information Technology Co., Ltd.

editorialNotes.standard: Makes organising files and revising PDFs as simple as using a word processor. With support for reading files from popular productivity suites, it’s a convenient way to take the office anywhere you go.
editorialNotes.short: Organise, annotate and edit your PDF library, and take your office anywhere.

editorialNotes.standard: With your iPad and Apple Pencil, design complex 3D models – no desk, mouse or keyboard needed. The ability to work offline means you’ll be able to sketch and design from anywhere.
editorialNotes.short: Create 3D Models
Your digital brain helps you keep track of everything.

editorialNotes.standard: For all its usefulness, the thing we appreciate most about this cloud-storage app is how little we have to think about it. Whatever we’re sharing or uploading, it all just works – seamlessly and effortlessly.
editorialNotes.short: All your files safe in one place across all your devices.

editorialNotes.standard: Ingeniously designed, Paper presents a powerfully modern tool for writing, drawing, note-taking and beyond. Sketch out ideas and whip up diagrams with a rich selection of responsive brushes. Using simple gestures, quickly annotate photos or transform text into beautifully formatted lists. It’s an excellent medium for capturing and organising the thoughts and images that you need every day.
editorialNotes.short: A powerfully-modern tool for writing, drawing, note-taking, and beyond.

editorialNotes.standard: A best-in-class handwriting experience. Extensive customisation, from paper and pen types to templates completely change the way we take notes.

editorialNotes.tagline: Tasks that keep you on track
editorialNotes.standard: A personal assistant for your brain. Refine your to-do list, prioritise your tasks on a chart or use the built-in Pomodoro timer to keep you balanced between productivity and burnout.
